name: tight
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: (held or kept together) firmly or closely
trans_examp.trans_cn: 紧的；密封的（地）；牢固的（地）

example.eg: I can't untie the knot - it's too tight.
example.egtrans: 我解不开这个结——太紧了。

example.eg: This lid is on very tight.
The people stood talking in tight groups.
example.egtrans: 大家一群群地紧挨着站在那里说话。

example.eg: Hold on tight when we go around the corner.
example.egtrans: 我们转弯时大家都要抓牢扶好。

example.eg: Check that windows and doors are shut tight (= completely closed) before you leave.
example.egtrans: 走之前检查一下窗户和门是否关严了。

example.eg: The plastic cover was stretched tight (= stretched as much as it could be) across the tank.
example.egtrans: 水箱上的塑料罩子绷得很紧。

name: tight
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

dsense.name: tight
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: Clothes or shoes that are tight fit the body too closely and are uncomfortable.

example.eg: That jacket's too tight - you need a bigger size.
example.egtrans: 那件夹克太紧身了——你需要号大一点的。

trans_examp.trans_en: If you have a tight feeling in your chest you have an uncomfortable feeling of pressure, caused by illness, fear, etc.
trans_examp.trans_cn: （由于疾病、恐惧等）憋闷的，不适的

dsense.name: tight
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: Controls or rules that are tight are ones that severely limit what can happen.

dsense.name: tight
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: If time or money is tight, there is only just enough of it.

example.eg: I'm sorry I can't stay for a chat, time's really tight.
example.egtrans: 对不起我不能停，时间真的很紧。

example.eg: They're raising three kids on one small salary so money is very tight.
example.egtrans: 他们靠一份微薄的薪水抚养3个孩子，所以手头很紧。

dsense.name: tight

trans_examp.trans_cn: 用钱不大方的，吝啬的（同 tight-fisted）

trans_examp.trans_en: If two people are tight, they know each other very well and like each other a lot.
trans_examp.trans_cn: 亲密的；个人关系密切的

example.eg: The two of them were pretty tight at school.
example.egtrans: 他们俩在学生时代关系非常亲密。
